tasks.description:
Set-up Alice PDx and prepare for Sleep Study.
1. Configure Alice PDx. Refer to manual if unsure.
2. Assign a Sleep Study Date and Complete the section [Office Use].
3. Print Sleep Study Documents on BizMan-V2.
4. Patient to sign where relevant on the day of Sleep Study.

Collect Alice PDx and process overnight data.
1. G3 - Import the data and transfer to CLM Sleep Co. server.
2. BizMan-V2 - Upload Completed Sleep Study Documents (Signed Medicare Form, Completed Tech Sheet, Sleep Log & Tech Feedback Form & Sleep Study Service Disclaimer).

Sleep Scientist: Scoring in progress.
1. Complete the section [Sleep Scientist Use].
Sleep Scientist Manager: QC in progress.
